mapper.select: select c.id, c.title, c.description, u.name as instructor, c.created_at as created_at, c.status from course c inner join users u on u.id=c.instructor_id order by c.id
mapper.insert: insert into course(instructor_id, title, description, status, created_at) values (#{instructor_id},#{title}, #{description}, #{status}, #{created_at})
